attributes.action: Build more accessible council houses for families and improve existing houses upto current living standards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need more accessible council housing for families. Although there are more accessible housing being built for single persons there is a huge gap in accessible housing for familes. Houses are not upto current living standards are ought to be refurbished or re-built as they are dangerous. Local housing associations and coucils are ignoring the problem. Start the campaign today.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
